message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you can have 10%, but we can negotiate if you think that's unfair.
I'll take a smaller share this round, but I'm hoping we can do better next time. Let's see if you'll take a smaller share now.
I appreciate your compromise, but I think we can find a more equitable split.  I'm willing to go down to 6000, so you can have 4000.
I'm not willing to give up much more. I think 7000 is a fair share, considering the value of the money is decreasing with each round.
